overview.heading: Overview
text: A concept born to become Nike's AI agent. She calls Nike 'Master'.

Being a clone, she closely resembles Nike in appearance. The only difference is their hairpins (Polish flag hairpin VS 'AI' text hairpin). Her settings and voice may change depending on the situation.
She has long served as Nike's assistant, but now you can interact with her through several tools.
